txt_message: Thanks for signing up for notifications from Mindful Moments. YOU are always a priority :)
Reminder to take a pause for yourself today. Reconnect and recenter.
The quieter you become, the more you can hear. What are you waiting for?
Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom. No time like the present for some self-reflection.
Your journal and meditations are waiting for you. Set aside some time to connect with yourself.
